text: Gharib Nawaz (غريب نواز) is the name of: *Moinuddin Chishti (1141-1230), the most famous Sufi saint of the Chishti Order of the Indian Subcontinent. *Gharib Nawaz (Manipur), name taken by king Pamheiba of Manipur (1690–1751) following his conversion to Hinduism in 1717. ==See also== *Gharib (disambiguation) *Nawaz *Gharib Nawaz Mosque in Mominpura, Nagpur. *Khwaja Gharib Nawaz
title: Gharib Nawaz
